metadata.subject: Lepeletier de Saint Fargeau, Michel, 1760-1793
metadata.title: Extrait du procès-verbal de la séance des Jacobins, du 20 janvier 1793, l'an 2me de la République.
metadata.creator: Tallien, Jean-Lambert, 1767-2616
Société des amis de la liberté et de l'égalité (Paris, France)
Lepelletier de Saint-Fargeau, Félix, 1769-1837
Maure, Nicolas, 1743-1795
Dorfeuille, Antoine, 1750?-1795
Galletti, G.-F, publisher
French Revolution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez G.F. Galletti, imprimeur, aux jacobins Saint-Honoré
metadata.description: Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Consists of addresses and letters on the death of Michel Lepeletier de Saint Fargeau by Félix Lepelletier de Saint-Fargeau, Nicolas Maure, Antoine Dorfeuille, and others
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: Title is on the cover. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
